* You look a little...
distraught.

* ,..5houldn’ t you check
on the tea?

#* Well, feel free to look
around?
page_12.png-底部文本框有头像非战斗:
* You don’t have to test
me.
* I'm... already strong.
page_15.png-底部文本框有头像非战斗:
* Tell me, do you wish to
return to the surface?
page_18.png-底部文本框有头像非战斗:
* I think I understand
what is happening...
page_19.png-底部文本框有头像非战斗:
* But I am afraid I can’t
back down.
page_20.png-底部文本框有头像非战斗:
* The monsters in these
RUINS have already
hurt you.
page_21.png-底部文本框有头像非战斗:

you can suryive without
my protection.
page_22.png-底部文本框有头像非战斗:

* I am doing this for you.
page_26.png-战斗文本框无头像战斗:
* You consider telling Asgore
that you killed him.
* ,..0nce again, that's creepy.
page_28.png-战斗文本框无头像战斗:
* You remind Asgore that the
other monsters love him.
* He looks away, flames wavering.
page_30.png-战斗文本框无头像战斗:
* Asgore tenses up.
* 0r maybe it’s your imagination.
page_31.png-战斗文本框无头像战斗:
* You tell him the other
monsters would miss him.
page_32.png-战斗文本框无头像战斗:
* His breathing gets funny for
a minute.
page_34.png-战斗文本框无头像战斗:
* You point out that it’s your
problem, not his.
* You were the one that ran away.
page_36.png-战斗文本框无头像战斗:
* Besides, who will take care
of the gardens?
* And what about that phone call?
page_38.png-战斗文本框无头像战斗:
* You try to think of something
else to say, but you' ve run
out of ideas.
page_51.png-战斗文本框无头像战斗:
* Seems talking won’t do anymore
good.
page_52.png-战斗文本框无头像战斗:
* Can you show mercy without
fighting or running away?
page_80.png-战斗文本框无头像战斗:
* You tell Asgore you’'1ll find
another way, but first he has
to give you a chance.
page_82.png-战斗文本框无头像战斗:
* Whether it is or not, you
promise to stay determined.
page_87.png-底部文本框有头像非战斗:
* Human, you have proven
yourself in more ways
than I expected.
page_88.png-底部文本框有头像非战斗:
* Your desire not to harm
another, your will to
resist the odds...
page_89.png-底部文本框有头像非战斗:
* I think you will do
just fine.
page_90.png-底部文本框有头像非战斗:
* Although, given the
climate, I have one
last gift for you
page_100.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
* (I really saved him...)
* (And all I had to do
was RESET.)
page_101.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
* Heht
* Guess that makes me a
superhero.
page_102.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
* (But something still
doesn’ t add up.)
page_103.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
* S0 if there’'s anyone

page_105.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
** lWell, it was worth a
try.
page_107.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
* Way to go, buddy?
* I'm impressed.
page_108.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
* How it’s like that
whole mess never
happened. ..
page_109.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
* And it’'s really okay
to Keep doing this?
page_110.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
* Sure?
* It's not like they'd
remember.
page_111.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
* And think of all the
good you can do?
page_112.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
* Then I've got one last
question for you...
page_113.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
* Did we know each other
before...?
page_115.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
* Don’t be silly, kid.
* I would’ ve told you
if we had.
page_116.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
* But you said you used
to be able to RESET
things, too.
page_117.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
* And some of this stuff
feels WAY too familiar
to be a coincidence.
page_118.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
* lWell, it coulda been
somebody else.
page_120.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
* A1l right...
* I trust you, Flowey.
page_121.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
* lWell, cheer up, okay?
* We can always look into
this on the way.
page_122.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
* But we won’t get
anywhere by standing
here.
page_123.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
* Then I guess it’s time
to hit the road?
